name: Botcord
body:
# Botcord
Botcord is a visual representation of OAuth applications in Discord, used to listen to a channel, chat as a bot, using a Node webserver.

# Our goal
We strive to reach full Discord experience for OAuth applications, with the resources of Discord API, rebuild visual style, easy-to-manage authentication.

# Planned updates
v1.2 - The Emoji Update

v1.3 - Authentication Who? Update

v1.4 - Easy-to-switch servers/channels

v1.5 - Pins! Mentions! Role Mentions! Update

v1.6 - Hey, know things OAuth applications can't do, but users can? Update

v1.7 - Virtual Friends (Mark people as friends, when in reality they aren't) Update

v1.8 - Say bye to using IDs, say hi to even user-friendlier experience Update

v2.0 - Overhaul of GUI, fully customizable color schemes, auto-text formater, developer mode Update.

# Support us
Support Botcord development, by dropping bits of code in our source code, helping our name get known, testing it yourself, searching for possible security holes, patching everything up.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
